name: Color Symphony 2
summary: Color Symphony 2 is a puzzle action platformer that utilizes the ambiguity of color. Try to eliminate obstacles or find new paths by using color!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 发行日期: 2015 年 10 月 17 日
  • 售价: $9.99
  • 官方网站: http://www.remimory.com/
  • 开发: REMIMORY
  • 发行: REMIMORY
